A

APIConnection - Class in edu.escuelaing.app.taller
The `APIConnection` class is responsible for establishing a connection to the OMDB API and retrieving information about a specified movie title.
APIConnection() - Constructor for class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.APIConnection

edu.escuelaing.app.taller - package edu.escuelaing.app.taller
 

G

getIndexPage() - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseData
Generates the HTML content for the index page, which includes a form to query movies and a div to display the API response as an HTML table.
getJSONErrorMessage() - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseData
Returns a JSON error message indicating that the requested resource was not found.
getNotFoundPage() - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseData
Generates the HTML content for the "not found" page, indicating that the requested resource does not exist.
getRequest(PrintWriter, HTTPResponseHeaders, HTTPResponseData) - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.APIConnection
Makes a GET request to the OMDB API using the specified user query and handles the response.

H

HTTPResponse(PrintWriter) - Static method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPServer
Sends the HTTP response for the index page to the client.
HTTPResponseData - Class in edu.escuelaing.app.taller
The `HTTPResponseData` class provides methods for generating HTML pages and JSON error messages to be sent as responses in an HTTP server.
HTTPResponseData() - Constructor for class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseData
 
HTTPResponseHeaders - Class in edu.escuelaing.app.taller
The `HTTPResponseHeaders` class provides methods for generating HTTP response headers based on the content type.
HTTPResponseHeaders(String) - Constructor for class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseHeaders
Constructs an `HTTPResponseHeaders` object with the specified content type.
HTTPServer - Class in edu.escuelaing.app.taller
The `HTTPServer` class represents a simple HTTP server that handles client connections.
HTTPServer() - Constructor for class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPServer
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPServer
The main method initializes the server socket and continuously accepts client connections.

N

NotFoundResponse() - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseHeaders
Generates the HTTP response headers for a "not found" response with the specified content type.

O

OKResponse() - Method in class edu.escuelaing.app.taller.HTTPResponseHeaders
